Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Seventy - nine percent had a normal or nonspecific ECG and 85 % had a TIMI score < 2 .

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Disease":

1. ECG (Electrocardiogram) - a test used to measure the electrical activity of the heart
2. TIMI (Thrombolysis In Myocardial Infarction) score - a score used to assess the severity of a heart attack based on the results of a blood test.

So, the two disease entities mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. ECG (normal or nonspecific)
2. Heart attack (based on TIMI score)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the disease entities mentioned in the paragraph:

1. Heart attack (based on TIMI score)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the disease entities mentioned in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Heart attack |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
